summary: I STRONGLY BELIEVE THE ODOMETER WAS TAMPERED WITH ON THIS VEHICLE. WHEN I PURCHASED IT WITH 16865 MILES-THE DAY AFTER I REALIZED DISPLAYED IN THE WINDOW WAS AN OIL STICKER WHICH READ THE NEXT SCHEDULED OIL CHANGE TO BE AT 40731 MILES. ALSO AN AGENCY HAS EVIDENCE OF THE CAR BEING INVENTORED AT AN AUTO AUCTION WITH MORE MILES ON IT THAN WHEN I PURCHASED IT WITH. PLEASE HELP ME IN THE INVESTIGATION INTO THIS MATTER. I APPRECIATE YOUR HELP AND LOOK FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU SOON. THANKS!  *PH    **DIMSII IOVQ ENTRY POSTER AFTER 12/12/02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS**769758
